sent.orig: Postdoctoral Research Fellow with the MUSCLE Internal Fellowship from European Research Consortium for Informatics and Mathematics.
sent.trans: 博士后研究员，获欧洲信息学与数学研究联盟MUSCLE博士后奖学金。

sent.orig: The seated calf muscle stretch: Stretch the rear muscle leg, called as the calf muscle.
sent.trans: 小腿（肠肌）伸：伸展小腿后方肌肉，也就是腓肠肌。

sent.orig: Release gluteus medius muscle? gluteus minimus muscle?piriformis muscle in serious 6 cases (3 patients).
sent.trans: 对严重的3例6臀，同时行臀中肌、臀小肌、梨状肌松解。

sent.orig: But skeletal muscle is very different from heart muscle.
sent.trans: 但骨骼肌与心肌有明显区别。

sent.orig: Abdominal law: Inspiratory when loosen abdominal muscle, expiratory when contractive abdominal muscle, such thresh 3 minutes.
sent.trans: 腹式呼吸法：吸气时放松腹肌，呼气时收缩腹肌，如此反复做3分钟。
